channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Broken glass, 13th April
item.description:
On rod
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 36 Dunalley Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 13th April
item.description:
Pushchair in the undergrowth, adjacent to ramp between Honeybourne & St Pauls Road. On the left as you walk up.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Hardwick Campus Saint Paul's Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement & road falling apart, 13th April
item.description:
The pavement and road are in an awful state and along with potholes are simply worn away. The pothole was mended briefly but whatever they did seems to have just made the situation worse. Please can this be fixed? It creates hazardous conditions for everyone who uses the road and pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 28 Church Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road in awful condition, 13th April
item.description:
Road is in a really bad state all the way down, particularly by the tennis club. Please can it be mended? Driving is becoming hazardous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 176 Old Bath Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very deep pothole, 13th April
item.description:
This road is in poor condition all the way down but there's a particularly big pothole here.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Old Bath Road, Naunton Park
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 Road Works Signs at Location NOW for 6 Months!!!, 13th April
item.description:
At the lacation - just close to where Cleeve Common Road comes off the Burnt Oak Junction - 2 Road works signs have been ther for at least 6 Months and are NOT being used. This is the 3rd request to have them removed as vehicles have hit them and at the moment they are flat on the ground. Please can this request be carried out as they are also an eyesore.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 12ins round pothole, 13th April
item.description:
Out side number 22 Humber place brockworth. It's been there for months
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 21 Humber Place, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dislodged slab, 12th April
item.description:
Trip hazard

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 27 Henrietta Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes & surface - extended area, 12th April
item.description:
Potholes & surface - extended area. This has been reported for weeks now if not months and no sign of repairs and getting worse all the time, damaging cars suspension as there's no way around the damaged areas. Its urgent.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 265 Priors Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot hole by slow sign, 12th April
item.description:
Pot hole by slow sign, but please review all down hill as there are several. Two or 3 marked for filling but several new ones have since appeared.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): B4070, Birdlip
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot hole, sink hole and poor surface, 12th April
item.description:
The surface between 36 and 58 Carlton Street requires resurfacing and has been missed out during previous resurfacing work along the street. The surface now needs radical treatment and is dangerous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 34 Carlton Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot hole, sink hole and poor surface, 12th April
item.description:
The surface between 36 and 58 Carlton Street requires resurfacing and has been missed out during previous resurfacing work along the street. The surface now needs radical treatment and is dangerous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 34 Carlton Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Fridge Freezer dumped outside garden wall of number 15, 12th April
item.description:
A fridge freezer that has come from number 14 St Paul's Walk has been dumped outside the garden wall of number 15. This was carried to the location by the children of 14 and 15. This happened on the 3.4.23 at 18.45hrs. This should be on the cctv footage from CBH hub cameras.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 20 Saint Pauls Walk, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damage to grass area next to footpath, 12th April
item.description:
Grass area next to footpath to the right of the entrance to village hall was dug up by contractors fitting City Fibre (last year) and not restored. Grass is now muddy mess with stones/bricks etc.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 28 Church Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Properly deep pothole on Shelley Road, 12th April
item.description:
Can somebody come and do something urgently please?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 43 Shelley Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic Light Timing, 11th April
item.description:
The traffic light timing from Gloucester Road to High Street or Townsend Street is too short, it only allows 5 - 7 vehicles through, causing lots of tailbacks. Also at night, the light doesn't change when there are no other vehicles passing the other ways - vehicles could be waiting for 3-7min before the light change (the sensor not working?)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Gloucester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
